net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.annotations

Annotation Type SQLiteTable


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface SQLiteTable
    Annotates a class that represents a table in a SQLite database and can contain a row of that table. See SQLiteHouse for details of how this fits into the overall framework.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String value
      Specifies the name of the database table defined by this annotation, rows of which may be contained in instances of the decorated class.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int since
      Specifies the first schema version in which this table was defined.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Specifies the name of the database table defined by this annotation, rows of which may be contained in instances of the decorated class.
        Returns:
        the database table name

      • since

        public abstract int since
        Specifies the first schema version in which this table was defined. The SQLiteHouse will use this information to determine when and whether to add the table to the database during onCreate() or onUpdate().
        Returns:
        the first database schema version that includes this table
        Default:
        1
